sentences.en: Abbott Larkin is building a new computer factory in Stamford.
sentences.cn: 阿伯特.拉金正在斯坦福德建新的计算机制造厂.

sentences.en: Because almost everyone in Stamford used to work at the Yale factory.
sentences.cn: 因为过去几乎每个斯坦福德人都在耶鲁锁厂工作过.

sentences.en: Cecil inherited a family property near Stamford.
sentences.cn: 塞西尔继承了斯坦福德附近的一处家族房产。

sentences.en: CHARLES: What about Jeff? Is he going to be happy in Stamford?
sentences.cn: 查尔斯: 杰夫怎么样? 他在斯坦福德会愉快 吗 ?

sentences.en: Detective Stone, you have to stop him. . . or we'll never see the Stamford Treaty again!
sentences.cn: 斯通侦探， 我们得去阻止他， 否则我们将再也见不到斯坦福德条约了！

sentences.en: DIANA: I could give you the names of art dealers in Stamford.
sentences.cn: 戴安娜: 我可以提供给你斯坦福德艺术品交易商们的名字.

sentences.en: Do you know anywhere in Stamford where you can see otters play?
sentences.cn: 你知道在斯坦福德哪儿能看到水獭嬉戏 吗 ?

sentences.en: Got it . Thank you, gentlemen . And welcome to Stamford, Mr. Tate.
sentences.cn: 好了,谢谢, 先生们,欢迎到斯坦福德来, 泰特先生.

sentences.en: Heartbroken Lamps wanted to see out his career at Stamford Bridge.
sentences.cn: 心灰意冷的弗兰克本打算在斯坦福桥结束自己的足球生涯.

sentences.en: In sports news, the Stamford Blue Jays are ahead.
sentences.cn: 体育新闻方面:斯坦福德“蓝雀”队领先.

sentences.en: Jake: Because almost everyone in Stamford used to work at the Yale factory.
sentences.cn: 杰克： 因为过去几乎每个斯坦福德人都在耶鲁锁厂工作过。

sentences.en: Maria: What about Pitney Bowes? They used to be in Stamford.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚: 皮德尼•鲍怎么样了? 他们过去也在斯坦福德.

sentences.en: Old shop, his gun at the Stamford bridge outfit.
sentences.cn: 老商店, 他的枪在斯坦福桥的球队.

sentences.en: Stamford workers used to make most of the world's glass tubes.
sentences.cn: 斯坦福德的工人们过去生产世界上大部分的玻璃管.

sentences.en: Susan: Really? The Stamford team is in first place.
sentences.cn: 苏珊: 真的? 斯坦福德队处于领先地位.

sentences.en: Thanks. Here goes: the Daily News, the Stamford Gazette.
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 这儿有各种报纸: 《每日新闻》 、 《斯坦福德公报》.

sentences.en: This game at Stamford Bridge was an easy game.
sentences.cn: 这场在斯坦福桥的比赛比较容易. ”

sentences.en: We have a small New England farm here at the Stamford Museum and Nature Center. We have many types of farm animals here.
sentences.cn: 在斯坦福德博物馆和自然中心这儿有一个新英格兰式小农场， 在这儿我们有许多种家畜。

trans.tran_cn: 斯坦福德[美国康涅狄格州西南部城市]
斯坦福德（美国康涅狄格州西南部城市）
